socket_token.label: Streamlabs Socket Token
socket_token.tooltip: The Streamlabs Socket Token. This can be found on the website via the left-hand side menu -> API Settings -> API Tokens -> Socket Token

resetHour.label: Reset Hour (0 is 12:00 Midnight local time)
resetHour.tooltip: Set the hour of the day that the reset will occur.

subDivisor.label: Subs Divisor
subDivisor.tooltip: Divisor text to separate count and goal.

followDivisor.label: Follow Divisor
followDivisor.tooltip: Divisor text to separate count and goal.

bitDivisor.label: Bit Divisor
bitDivisor.tooltip: Divisor text to separate count and goal.
